mapper.insert: INSERT into user_mentor (mentorNo, mantor_id, passwd, name, region, age, nickname, lngName, portfolio, mNo, gradeByMNum, type) values (#{mentorNo}, #{mantor_id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{region}, #{age}, #{nickname}, #{lngName}, #{portfolio}, #{mNo}, #{gradeByMNum}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_mentor SET mantor_id = #{mantor_id}, passwd = #{passwd}, region = #{region}, nickname = #{nickname}, lngName = #{lngName}, portfolio = #{portfolio} where mentorNo = #{mentorNo}
